borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Erection of a side extension at first floor level, over part of the proposed single storey side extension; erection of a single storey side extension; erection of a single storey rear extension, to the side and rear of existing back addition; alterations to the external facade to include, replacement of existing main roof tiles with new artificial slates, and rendering of the walls; installation of a green roof, and a rooflight on top of the existing first floor back addition; installation of new aluminium framed windows to replace existing windows to the rear and side elevations at first floor level; formation of a roof terrace enclosed in 1.7m high obscure glazed screening over part of the flat roof of proposed single storey rear extension; installation of a new double door following the removal of an existing window to the side elevation at first floor level, to provide access to the proposed roof terrace; installation of 2no. aluminium framed double doors to replace existing French doors to the side elevation at ground floor level; formation of a courtyard between the rear of the main building and proposed single storey rear extension, including removal and infilling of existing French doors to the side elevation.
